name: df-pprod
body: |- wceq(cpprod(c0, c1), ctxp(ccom(c0, cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), ccom(c1, cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)))))

comment: Define the parallel product of two classes. Membership in this class is defined by ~ pprodss4v and ~ brpprod . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)
